Class AbstractCrudController<DTO,ID>

java.lang.Object
com.cb.backend.controller.AbstractCrudController<DTO,ID>
Type Parameters:
DTO - the type of Data Transfer Object handled by the controller
ID - the type of the entity identifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudController<DTO,ID>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlogController, CategoryController, CommentController, IngredientController, ProductController, RatingController, RecipeController, UserController
public abstract class AbstractCrudController<DTO,ID> extends Object implements CrudController<DTO,ID>
Abstract base class for standard CRUD REST controllers.

Provides generic implementations of GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE endpoints for any DTO and ID type. Subclasses must provide the corresponding CrudService by implementing getService().

Endpoints:

  • GET / – retrieve all entities
  • GET /{id} – retrieve entity by ID
  • POST / – create a new entity
  • PUT /{id} – update an existing entity
  • DELETE /{id} – delete an entity by ID
